remarks: The range of the partition is between its starting point and its ending point.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem15.1 $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem15.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem15.3 $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem15 $p |- ( ph -> Q : ( 0 ... M ) --> ( A [,] B ) ) $.
$d A i m p $.
$d B i m p $.
$d M i $.
